item.name: Remap F19 (ctrl_L) to ctrl, alt, cmd, shift
Remap shift_L to shift_L (when typed, send ctrl-a)
item.autogen: --KeyOverlaidModifier-- KeyCode::SHIFT_L, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L | ModifierFlag::NONE, KeyCode::SHIFT_L, KeyCode::A, ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L

item.name: Remap shift-R to F17 - letter - F17
